definitions.definition: A stable suspension of small droplets of one liquid in another with which it is immiscible .
examples: Mayonnaise is an emulsion where egg is used to keep oil and water mixed.

definitions.definition: A colloid in which both phases are liquid.
The coating of photosensitive silver halide grains in a thin gelatine layer on a photographic film .

main_definition: A stable suspension of small droplets of one liquid in another with which it is immiscible .
secondary_definitions: ( physical chemistry ) A colloid in which both phases are liquid.
( photography ) The coating of photosensitive silver halide grains in a thin gelatine layer on a photographic film .
